exceptions.tactic: intros X q p H1 H2.
intros X' q p H1 H2.
intros X' q' p H1 H2.
intros X' q' p' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type p, q : X -> Prop H : enumerable p H0 : enumerable q Unable to unify "exists f : nat -> option ?M1563, enumerator f (fun x : ?M1563 => ?M1564 x /\\ ?M1565 x)" with "exists f : nat -> option X, enumerator f (fun x : X => p x \\/ q x)".

In environment H1 : forall (X : Type) (p q : X -> Prop), discrete X -> enumerable p -> enumerable q -> enumerable (fun x : X => p x /\\ q x) X : Type p, q : X -> Prop x : nat -> option X H2 : enumerator x q x0 : nat -> option X H0 : enumerator x0 p Unable to unify "exists f : nat -> option ?M2335, enumerator f (fun x : ?M2335 => ?M2336 x /\\ ?M2337 x)" with "exists f : nat -> option X, enumerator f (fun x : X => p x \\/ q x)".

In environment H : forall (X : Type) (p q : X -> Prop), discrete X -> enumerable p -> enumerable q -> enumerable (fun x : X => p x /\\ q x) X : Type p, q : X -> Prop x : nat -> option X H2 : enumerator x q x0 : nat -> option X H0 : enumerator x0 p H1 : forall x0 : X, q x0 -> exists n : nat, x n = Some x0 Unable to unify "exists n : nat, x n = Some ?M2793" with "exists f : nat -> option X, enumerator f (fun x : X => p x \\/ q x)".

original: intros X q p H1 H2. apply enumerable_conj. apply H1. apply H2.
